title: Monsters with hits creatures as a +x weapon (SLASH'EM)
data:
In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), various monsters [require a weapon of a certain enchantment level to be hit](/wiki/Need_%2Bx_weapon_to_hit "Need +x weapon to hit"), also known as "enchantment resistance" - accompanying this [property](/wiki/Property "Property") is the ability to [hit creatures as a +x weapon](/wiki/Hits_creatures_as_%2Bx_weapon "Hits creatures as +x weapon"). Most monsters with this ability are either those that possess significant strength or are magical in some manner.

This property treats the monster's attacks as coming from a weapon of a certain enchantment, with the enchantment specified in the flag within that monster's entry in [monst.c](/wiki/Monst.c "Monst.c") (e.g., `MR_HITASONE`, `MR_HITASTWO` and so on). The property is also intrinsic to monsters with "enchantment resistance": these monsters are not given a specific "hits as" flag, but implicitly hit monsters as the same enchantment of weapon that they resist[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) - e.g., the [Aleax](/wiki/Aleax "Aleax") has the `MR_PLUSTWO` flag but no `MR_HITASFOO`, so Aleaxes require a +2 weapon or better to hit and hit as +2 weapons themselves.

Below is a list of **monsters that hit as a certain enchantment of weapon** - monsters with i next to their names have this property implicitly due to their enchantment resistance.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Hits creatures as a +1 weapon](#Hits_creatures_as_a_.2B1_weapon)
- [2 Hits creatures as a +2 weapon](#Hits_creatures_as_a_.2B2_weapon)
- [3 Hits creatures as a +3 weapon](#Hits_creatures_as_a_.2B3_weapon)
- [4 Hits creatures as a +4 weapon](#Hits_creatures_as_a_.2B4_weapon)
- [5 References](#References)

## Hits creatures as a +1 weapon

html:
Monsters with hits creatures as a +x weapon (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, various monsters require a weapon of a certain enchantment level to be hit, also known as "enchantment resistance" - accompanying this property is the ability to hit creatures as a +x weapon. Most monsters with this ability are either those that possess significant strength or are magical in some manner.

This property treats the monster's attacks as coming from a weapon of a certain enchantment, with the enchantment specified in the flag within that monster's entry in monst.c (e.g., MR_HITASONE, MR_HITASTWO and so on). The property is also intrinsic to monsters with "enchantment resistance": these monsters are not given a specific "hits as" flag, but implicitly hit monsters as the same enchantment of weapon that they resist[1] - e.g., the Aleax has the MR_PLUSTWO flag but no MR_HITASFOO, so Aleaxes require a +2 weapon or better to hit and hit as +2 weapons themselves.

Below is a list of monsters that hit as a certain enchantment of weapon - monsters with i next to their names have this property implicitly due to their enchantment resistance.

Contents

  • 1 Hits creatures as a +1 weapon
  • 2 Hits creatures as a +2 weapon
  • 3 Hits creatures as a +3 weapon
  • 4 Hits creatures as a +4 weapon
  • 5 References
